programme.title: Special Delivery - EP 1
programme.desc: Many Cambodian children suffer and die each year from waterborne disease. It is an unnecessary tragedy caused by poverty and very poor sanitation - especially for the villagers living in Siem Reap province. Host Khai Saharom takes on a special delivery - sponsoring and bringing water filters to a rural village to help combat and solve the problem. The journey promises to be eventful as Khai must himself drive the truck carrying the filters - something he has never done before.

programme.title: Kody Kapow - EP 24
programme.desc: Kody Kapow is about an aspiring martial arts-style superhero named Kody who spends the summer with his extended family in a small village in China. His grandfather, a martial arts master, teaches Kody ancient lessons of mindfulness, patience and perseverance, which Kody employs as he and his super spy cousin Mei set off on adventures in the village together with their tiger friend Goji.

programme.title: Zoids WILD - EP 28
programme.desc: Continuing adventures of Arashi in his quest to become a Zoid Hunter and find his ultimate Partner.

programme.title: Turning Mecard - EP 18
programme.desc: Jason loves the mystical minicars he hears so much about. One day, he meets Evan, a real living minicar that transforms into a creature called Mecanimal. Mecanimals are from a different world called Triforce, and have special powers to battle each other. Jason and Evan bond and realise they both need one another to find missing family members. Their quest will take them on an amazing adventure!

programme.title: Extreme Football - EP 16
programme.desc: Extreme Football is an urban spin off of traditional five-a-side incorporating elements of free running and acrobatics. Created by and for children, as soon as Samy discovers it he is determined to captain a team. He sets about recruiting his closest friend Greg and Mediterranean girl Ines as defenders, quick-witted Luna as the star striker and hyperactive Joey as goalkeeper. Together they form The Team.

programme.title: DinoCore - EP 23
programme.desc: "Baryon", the great Dino Master of Dino Star, is defeated by the evil "Darkno". Before he dies, he sends his three most trusted DinoCores: Tyranno, Saber and Stego, to Earth with the ancient guardian Dino Tuner. Many years after Baryon's defeat, a carefree boy named Rex comes across the Tuner and becomes the new Dino Master. Meanwhile, Darkno takes over one planet after another and finally reaches Earth.

programme.title: Me, Myself & Isaac! - EP 1
programme.desc: Tired and bored with the crazy schedule his bossy sister has set for him this school holidays, Isaac Ang decides to order himself two clones to do his bidding. But what seems to be an awesome thing soon turns out to be nothing but trouble as both his clones -- dubbed Sporty and Smarty -- turn his life upside down!

programme.title: Vanishing Foods - EP 8
programme.desc: Made with a sauce that takes 30 days to perfect. An ingredient, 'grago' shrimp, that money often cant buy because of sporadic supply. All the reasons why a Singapore Peranakan braised pork dish, Babi Tohay, is vanishing. Chef Malcolm Lee, of Michelin-starred Candlenut Restaurant, shares his secrets.

programme.title: Matthew Bourne's Sleeping Beauty
programme.desc: Perrault's timeless fairy tale about a young girl cursed to sleep for one hundred years has been turned into a supernatural tale of vampires, fairies and decadent gothic opulence. Yet in the end, young love finally triumphs over all as Aurora is rescued by her one true prince.

programme.title: Films & Stars - EP 616
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S4 - EP 9
programme.desc: Junior Bake Off is back for a fourth series, hosted by comedy duo Sam Nixon and Mark Rhodes. Top international chef Allegra McEvedy is joined by The Great British Bake Off winner Nadiya Hussain to judge 40 of Britain's best young bakers.

programme.title: Pound Puppies 2 - EP 4
programme.desc: The mission of a team of fearless dogs is to find homes for puppies in need. Their motto is A pup for every person and a person for every pup.

programme.title: Get Blake - EP 47
programme.desc: Blake and his best friend Mitch constantly find themselves under siege by three silly squirrels in their city block. These are not just regular old Earth-squirrels, they're ALIEN squirrels! They have been sent from the future with one secret goal: capture Blake!

programme.title: Horrid Henry 3 - EP 37
programme.desc: Adapted from the international best selling books, Horrid Henry is the iconic anti-hero who does the most fabulously naughty things most children only dream of.

programme.title: Future Card Buddyfight Ace - EP 32
programme.desc: The anime's story takes place 23 years after the events of Future Card Buddyfight X and centres on Yuga Mikado, son of Gao Mikado. Because Yuga is talented at games, he is known as the "Ace of Games." However, Buddyfight is Yuga's first card game. Yuga's buddy is Gargantua Dragon, a.k.a. Garga.

programme.title: Josiah - EP 3
programme.desc: Roy accidentally broke Sophia's vintage musical box that was given by her late mother and the factory that made it no longer exists. How can Sophia fix her precious musical box?

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 19 - EP 3
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Raised on the sheltered island paradise of Themyscira, Diana leaves her home when an American pilot crashes on their shores and tells of a massive conflict raging in the outside world. Convinced she can stop the threat and fighting alongside man in a war to end all wars, Diana will discover her full powersand her true destiny. Starring Gal Gadot and Chris Pine.

programme.title: News 5 - EP 13

programme.title: Hotspots: The Last Hope - EP 2
programme.desc: Our planet is abundant with life. But in some places where there is an especially large variety of animal and plant species, there is also a high level of habitat destruction. These are areas that demand special protection: the Hotspots of biodiversity. In recent years, three species are driven to extinction every day. Scientists have found a solution: we must preserve the Hotspots.

programme.title: Cesar's Recruit: Asia S3 - EP 3

(重)新系列《空中访民情》，邀请政府部门的部长、高级政务部长、高级政务次长，以及嘉宾们共聚新传媒园区，以轻松的聊天方式讨论教育、就业、健康、家庭和经济等课题。部长也会在节目中，解答民众通过街头访问提出的反馈。这系列共有六集，由电台广播员林灵芝和时事节目主持人苏美兰主持，并将通过多平台呈献给观众、听众和网民。.

programme.title: 料理的秘密 Food Secrets - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) In Japan, ramen is a popular form of fast food, with more than 130,000 ramen shops in Tokyo alone. What secrets enable chain stores and independent shops to stand out in amongst the competition? Undisclosed soup recipes, noodle-making techniques, or the relentless search for the best ingredients? (重)日式拉面五花八门，是日本上班族能快速填饱肚子的快餐。单单在东京就有超过13万家拉面店，所以各家必须使出浑身解数才能突围而出。连锁店和独立店家要在白热化的竞争中占有一席之地，究竟采用了什么杀手锏？.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) There is a saying "Daughters are like split water"! But now, it seems otherwise. Men are caught in between the mother-in-law and wife, does it mean that women are taking mightier role in marriage? Is it true that having daughter is better than having son? Let's hear from Ian Fang and the guests! (重)人家说"女儿是泼出去的水" ！现今社会，是不是儿子才是泼出去的水？男人常被夹在婆媳关系之间，这代表女人在婚姻中的强势地位吗？如今，是不是生女儿更"划算"？新一代小生方伟杰和为人父母的嘉宾们一一给你剖析！.

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) There was a shortage of 15,000 newborns and 1800 infant deaths in Taiwan last year. In remote villages, a kid's birth marks the start of a life battle. (重)去年，台湾少了15000个新生儿，却有1800个孩子死亡，生得少，死得多。在偏乡，孩子从出生开始，就是一场人生战役。坑坑洞洞的儿童医疗网，让家长无奈孩子无法控诉，政府是否该正视儿童医疗资源不均的问题？.

programme.desc: (R) Zhenshu slaps Xiuqing when the latter insults her for abandoning her family for another man. Zaiyong finds out that Minzhi owes the loansharks a big sum of money. He gives Minzhi a sum of money. In exchange, he wants Minzhi to update him with news of Jin Minxiu. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀卿指真淑当年跟别的男人外遇，抛弃家人，是个肮脏的女人。真淑忍无可忍，打了秀卿一巴掌。载永发现民植欠高利贷钱，于是私下拿出一大笔钱给他还债，但条件是要民植告诉他金民秀的消息。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 17
programme.desc: (R) Chief Fang is assaulted and wounded badly. He is sent to the hospital for emergency surgery. Zhixu guesses Xianxiu did it and asks Youjing to investigate Xianxiu. The emergency surgery saved chief Fang's life. Zhixu and others waiting outside the operation theatre feel relieved. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)方股长遭人袭击，伤重送院接受手术抢救。智旭猜是贤秀所为，请宥静调查贤秀。紧急施救终于让方股长逃脱了死神的手心，在手术室门外等候的智旭等众人这才放下心来。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 1
programme.desc: Hong Zhiyuan is looking desperately for a bone marrow donor to save her dying son, Hai Chen. She finds out that Ruli's bone marrow matches his. She seeks Ruli's father to help but the latter rejected her. (PG)(首播)(双声道-中/韩)洪智媛儿子海成得了白血病,唯一能配上血型的就是孙如莉. 她拜托如莉的爸爸孙柱浩,希望他能答应女儿捐献骨髓，但是其爸爸却不愿意。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 2
programme.desc: Ruli's father, Sun Zhuhao, stops Zhiyuan from taking away Ruli for the operation. Both meet with an accident and Ruli's father died. Meanwhile, Daozi returned from the United States for a marrow donor blood test for his nephew. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)如莉的爸爸孙柱浩阻止洪智媛把孙如莉带走,两人遭遇车祸, 孙柱浩身亡.同时, 具道治从美国回来,想捐献骨髓给外甥.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 1
programme.desc: Death is inevitable, but dying painfully can and should be avoided. In Mongolia, where cancer mortality rates are one of the world's highest, Danny Yeo meets palliative care doctors whom are fighting against system and social barriers, to help patients find meaning and comfort in "a good death". (首播)蒙古医疗资源紧张，可是临终护理一枝独秀。这跟蒙古有众多肝癌末期病人有关，更是“临终护理之母”敖登托雅教授努力的成果。杨君伟发现，临终部门的强力止痛针，对垂死病人尤其珍贵。临终护理，如何实现蒙古人的善终？.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 13
programme.desc: The Devil King arranges for Shanmei to meet Jonathan at his house, hoping that their reunion will drive Wu Kong mad. Wu Kong gets jealous when Jonathan shakes Shanmei's hand and hugs her. Wu Kong kisses Shanmei in front of everyone. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)魔王故意安排善美和乔纳森在他家见面，想让他们上演戏剧般的重逢，让悟空吃醋。悟空看到乔纳森和善美牵手和拥抱，果然觉得很不是滋味，于是上前强吻善美。.

programme.title: 离家。出走 Greener Pastures - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Hong Kong's current situation has frustrated its people, prompting some of them to leave the country. And Taiwan has become the first choice for Hong Kong residents in search of a less stressful environment. Still, there are those who returned to Hong Kong after spending time away. (重)香港时局纷扰，催促许多港人纷纷离家，出走他乡。台湾因为地理相近、就业与生活压力较小，成为港人移民首选。与此同时，却也有许多97移民第二代回流香港，踏上寻根之路，重新回到当年父母离开的地方。.

programme.title: 探索食材 The Food Detectives 3 - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) The new season of "The Food Detectives" continues the culinary exploration of the foods we eat and more. Host Nikki Muller, will debunk the myths, delve into the unknowns and provide useful information to help us make informed choices for the meals we enjoy and how they fit into our lifestyles. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 寂寞鱼•听见 A Lonely Fish - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Jing Xuan returns home hearing a familiar melody which jolted her memory. Jing Xuan finds a chance to sound Ann out about her relationship with Hao Cheng but to no avail. Jing Xuan returns to the accident site with Kora but cannot muster enough courage to walk up to the spot. A mysterious man appear and laid down a bouquet of flowers.Tim prepares dinner and Jing Xuan finds the taste familiar. Jing Xuan has some recollections of her childhood memories after Tim plays the piano. Jing Xuan wonder (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)静萱从电梯出来，听到熟悉的旋律，想起舞蹈比赛当天。在美甲店，静萱试探Ann与浩成的关系，但Ann说那天没特别的事发生。静萱和Kora之后到车祸现场调查，静萱还是不敢面对，离开了。现场出现一个神秘男子，在车祸地点留下一束鲜花。Tim为大家做了晚餐，味道让静萱觉得很熟悉。静萱看着Tim弹琴，想起小时候的画面。静萱不解为何记忆里会有Tim，问亦凯小时候他们是否见过，亦凯说没有并说静萱记错了，静萱有点失望。静萱因之前看到Kora和亦凯在拍摄毕业短片时表现得很亲密而吃醋，对Kora冷漠，让Kora很伤心。亦凯来找静萱不巧遇到Kora，安慰她。静萱看着亦凯和Kora开心互动，心里难受。静萱到骨灰塔探望父母，竟然听到明珍的声音。静萱试着对话，但明珍没有回应。静萱走楼梯回家，看到情侣接吻，想起了小时候看到明珍和Tim亲密的互动。静萱赶紧回家翻找父母的东西，没想到让静萱找到了明珍、Tim、浩成、Ann四人的合照。静萱还找到一个磁带，磁带盒子上有明珍和Tim的高中照片。明珍和Tim 到底有什么不能说的秘密…….

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 61
programme.desc: (R) Yinghao tells Xiantai that Jin Minxiu is his deceased friend's son. Minxiu holds 20 percent of the company's shares and is therefore instrumental in helping Yinghao maintain control of the company. Zaiyong bugs Yinghao's office to find out about the identity and whereabouts of Jin Minxiu. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)英鎬告诉贤泰金民秀是他已故朋友的儿子，拥有公司百分之二十的股份。只要找到金民秀就可以掌握经营权。载永为了查出金民秀的身份和下落，暗自在英鎬的办公室里装置窃听器。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 18
programme.desc: (R) Youjing is under the pressure of both his superior and the public and gets severely criticized as Xianxiu got into a car accident when the prosecution tried to arrest him. Youjing runs into Zhixu, Fengxi and Enhe when he visits Xianxiu in the hospital. Enhe passes him the name list of the perpetrators related to Xianxiu's case, which chief Fang has collected. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)因为贤秀是在检方的追捕过程中发生车祸事故，宥静受到上司和民众的双重压力严厉指责。宥静去医院探望贤秀时碰到了智旭、奉熙和恩赫。恩赫把方股长收集到的可能与贤秀事故有关的肇事者名单交给了宥静。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 3
programme.desc: Zhiyuan adopts Ruli after her father's death. Ruli complies with her father's will to donate the bone marrow to Haicheng but in reality, Zhiyuan had forged Zhuhao's consent document. Meantime, Wulie proposes to Ruli. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)如莉的爸爸死后, 洪智媛领养了如莉. 如莉遵照父亲的遗愿捐献骨髓，但其实那一份骨髓捐献书是洪智苑模仿孙柱浩的名字仿签的. 此时,金武烈向如莉求婚.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 4
programme.desc: Ruli discovered she is pregnant with Wulie's baby. Haicheng's sickness relapses and Zhiyuan wants Ruli to do a bone marrow transplant again. Ruli is in a dilemma. Haizhu manages to get Wulie to submitting to her by helping to settle his mother's debts. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)如莉怀了武烈的孩子,而海成再次犯病洪智媛急找如莉捐献骨髓，如莉左右为难.对武烈有爱意的海珠替武烈的妈妈还清了债务, 武烈只能向海珠妥协.

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 9
programme.desc: From celebrity politicians to white-collar workers, everyone in Copenhagen rides a bicycle and 9 out of 10 persons own a bicycle in this "Kingdom of Bicycles". Cycling can reduce CO2 emissions by 80,000 tons per year and Copenhagen will be world's first Zero Carbon Emissions capital city in 2025. 在哥本哈根，从明星政要，到普通白领，人人骑脚车。每10人就有9人有脚车，不愧是“脚车王国”。在哥本哈根骑车出行，每年能减少8万吨的二氧化碳排放量，这里将在2025年成为世界上第一个碳排放归零的首都。.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 14
programme.desc: Shanmei picks up a bell that Zhenxian leaves behind. The bell rings when Shanmei bumps into Wu Kong on the streets. Not knowing that the bell is a death bell, Shanmei is over the moon when she thinks the ringing signifies that she has met her true love. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)善美捡到振贤弄丢的死铃，却以为那是爱铃。善美在街上与悟空相遇时听到铃声，以为铃声代表悟空是她命中注定的情人，于是开心不已。.

programme.title: 金装律师 Suits - EP 16
programme.desc: (R) Yanyu decides to turn himself in to the police for being a phoney lawyer. Before that, he visits his granny and lies that he is going to study aboard. Yanyu's granny passes away while his trial was ongoing which devastates him. Meanwhile, Kangshuo is very upset that he had not protected Yanyu well. (PG)(重)(大结局)(双声道-中/韩)延宇决定去警局自首，承认他的假律师身份。他去探望奶奶并谎称要去留学。延宇的奶奶在他审讯的过程中不幸去世，令延宇伤心欲绝。另一边的康硕因没保护好延宇，感到十分难过。.

programme.title: 开门七件事 Essential 7 - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) How did the "Essential 7" as we know and enjoy come to be? Just how are they processed and what revolutionary transformations did they undergo? (重)七件事经过了哪些处理程序，经历了怎样的革命性改变，才成就了今天我们日常生活中所品，所闻，所见的柴米油盐醋茶？.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 62
programme.desc: (R) Director Song discovers that Xiantai is Jin Minxiu. Zaiyong lies that he is sent by Xiantai to meet up with Director Song. He knocks Director Song down with his car after Director Song passed him Xiantai's records at the orphanage. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)宋院长翻查过往的资料，发现贤泰就是大家在找的金民秀。载永谎称贤泰派他跟宋院长见面。载永从宋院长的手中接获贤泰在育幼院的资料后，开车撞倒宋院长。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 19
programme.desc: (R) Zhixu is very shocked and sad when he discovers that Fengxi's father is connected to his parents' death. He finds all sorts of excuses to avoid Fengxi. Wanting to know the truth behind his father's death in the fire, Zhixu asks chief Fang for help to find the records of the case. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)智旭发现父母的死亡与奉熙的父亲有关后，感到十分震惊和难过。他于是尽量找借口避开奉熙。智旭请方股长帮忙寻找他父亲当年火灾去世的案件档案，想了解真相。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 5
programme.desc: Ruli decided to keep the baby and refuses to be a marrow donor and runs away from Zhiyuan. Unfortunately, Haicheng died and Zhiyuan vows to take revenge on Ruli. In order to save her life and her baby, Ruli claimed to have killed a man in order to hide in the prison. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)如莉决定把孩子留下拒绝捐献骨髓，便避开智媛。海成不幸逝世，智媛悲痛欲绝要向如莉报复。如莉为了保护腹中的孩子承认自己是杀人犯，这样洪智媛就不会找到自己。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 6
programme.desc: Wulie and Haizhu get married and Haizhu gives birth to twins whereas Ruli also gives birth to a baby girl, named Xiaochun, in prison. Three years later, Luli is saddened to hear Xiaochun is dead after adoption. She plans to take revenge on Zhiyuan. She studies law in prison and becomes a lawyer. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)武烈与海珠结婚生下一对双胞胎，同时如莉也在监狱里生下女儿小春。三年后，如莉得知小春被领养后不幸逝世，如莉相信是智媛害死了小春，她充实自己打算找智媛一家报仇。.

programme.title: 进击的台湾 2 Hello Taiwan S2 - EP 14
programme.desc: This programme takes a look at some of Taiwan's famous eateries and dishes. Most importantly, the programme also reveals the moving story behind its success. (最后一集)介绍台湾当地的美食与它们成功背后的故事.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 15
programme.desc: A pair of siblings are frequently abused by their father, but they do not dare to ask for help. One day, the younger girl dies unexpectedly and her spirit is trapped in a story book. The girl's spirit escapes from the book when she misses her brother too much. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)两名兄妹长期受虐却不敢向外人求助。某一天，妹妹离奇坠楼，过后灵魂就被困在一本图书里。不久后，想念哥哥的妹妹从书中逃脱，出现在冬将军的店里。冬将军觉得小女孩很可怜，于是找悟空帮忙。.

In order to save her life and her baby, Ruli claimed to have killed a man in order to hide in the prison. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)如莉决定把孩子留下拒绝捐献骨髓，便避开智媛。海成不幸逝世，智媛悲痛欲绝要向如莉报复。如莉为了保护腹中的孩子承认自己是杀人犯，这样洪智媛就不会找到自己。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Wulie and Haizhu get married and Haizhu gives birth to twins whereas Ruli also gives birth to a baby girl, named Xiaochun, in prison. Three years later, Luli is saddened to hear Xiaochun is dead after adoption. She plans to take revenge on Zhiyuan. She studies law in prison and becomes a lawyer. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)武烈与海珠结婚生下一对双胞胎，同时如莉也在监狱里生下女儿小春。三年后，如莉得知小春被领养后不幸逝世，如莉相信是智媛害死了小春，她充实自己打算找智媛一家报仇。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 2 Sound Of My Dream 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Produced by the same people behind Sing!, Sound of My Dream boasts 5 top-notch mentors, (Sandy Lam, JJ Lin, Yu Quan Group, Jane Zhang), impressive sets and production, and a very unique contest format. The contest witnesses the challenges and preparation each mentor puts into their performances as they prove their worth. And it features stellar performances from mentors and amateurs alike. 本季四组常驻导师为羽泉、林忆莲、林俊杰和张靓颖，主持人为华少。另从本季开始新设立客座导师一位，称之为“神秘导师”，每期更换。第二季在选歌方式与上季不同，选歌、定歌都在录影前，练歌则是在录影前6小时之内完成（上季只有3小时，这季增加音樂導師练歌时间）；6小时后在舞台将直接接受追梦歌手讨教。.

programme.title: Wasabi 新体验 Find The Wasabi 2 - EP 6
programme.desc: "Find the Wasabi 2" is a 'reality-game travelogue' series featuring 3 Asian celebrities who are on a special mission to find the 'secret spice' of Japan... In each episode, the Hunters are challenged by a powerful "Commander" to solve 'mysteries' about Japan that puzzle people around the world. (重)WASABI新体验第二季再出击，徐鸣杰将与来自泰国及马来西亚的朋友在日本学习当忍者，通过不同的任务竞赛，探索不为人知的日本文化，带给你潮流、美食、旅游等第一手资料，发现日本新魅力！这一系列的Wasabi主持人是性感女神藤原纪香。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 3
programme.desc: Aidan finally realizes after Xiao Hong is proven to be his daughter that he really does have the ability to turn all his lies into the truth. So he starts lying to his advantage and even uses this ability to clinch an important deal for the company, impressing both his Boss and immediate superior. De Hua questions Aidan why he did not think of wishing himself a million dollars. Aidan lies to De Hua that he will pick up a million dollars and the next day, Aidan does come across the chance to ge Aidan恍然小红原来是自己谎言‘所生’的孩子后，证明了自己有让谎话成真的能力！于是，Aidan开始利用谎言，让自己无往不利，更替公司争取到一个重要的广告商机，令上司明烈对他刮目相看。德华不解Aidan为何不撒谎让自己拥有一百万？一言惊醒梦中人，Aidan于是对德华撒谎说自己将捡到一百万，隔日，Aidan果然在路上捡到了一百万！可是。。.

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 9
programme.desc: From celebrity politicians to white-collar workers, everyone in Copenhagen rides a bicycle and 9 out of 10 persons own a bicycle in this "Kingdom of Bicycles". Cycling can reduce CO2 emissions by 80,000 tons per year and Copenhagen will be world's first Zero Carbon Emissions capital city in 2025. 在哥本哈根，从明星政要，到普通白领，人人骑脚车。每10人就有9人有脚车，不愧是“脚车王国”。在哥本哈根骑车出行，每年能减少8万吨的二氧化碳排放量，这里将在2025年成为世界上第一个碳排放归零的首都。.

programme.title: 爷爷的路 My Grandfather's Road - EP 2
programme.desc: My Grandfather's Road aims to uncover even more roads in Singapore named after notable founding fathers and pioneers through their descendants. Through in-depth interviews, archive footages and show and tells, we will learn more about the country's past as well as the people who helped make Singapore the success that it is today. (重)《爷爷的路》的目的是发现更多以开国元勋和先锋而命名的马路。通过深入采访他们的子孙后裔、录像档案、演出和口述，让我们对国家的历史以及建国功臣们有更加深入的了解。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 31
programme.desc: Ep 31: The advertisement featuring Shimei and the kids wrongly portray them as poor and helpless. Haixiu is mistaken for not taking good care of them while the children are ridiculed in school. Ep 31: 艺苑要世美等人拍的广告把他们拍成是孤苦无依的孩子们。海秀被误会成是让孩子们饿肚子的姐姐，孩子们则被同学们取笑是乞丐。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 32
programme.desc: Ep 32: Yiyuan questions Guixi when she hears that Yuzhen has gone on his knees before her. Yiyuan wants Guixi not to interfere in her affairs or she will expose Guixi for mishandling the company's funds. Ep 32: 艺苑听说宇真在贵熙面前下跪后，立刻质问贵熙为何如此对待宇真和他的家人。接着，艺苑声明自己掌握贵熙私吞公款的证据，要贵熙不要再干涉她的私事，否则向父亲揭发贵熙的不是。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 15
programme.desc: Ep 16 Haila is jealous to see Sharon getting close to Xiuhao. Haila confesses to Sharon that she likes Xiuhao. Xiuhao announces that he will re-investigate on the fire accident in his fathers lab.Ep 17Haila is doubtful when Pu Zhemin informs her that her father killed Xiuhao's father. Meanwhile, a skeleton is found in a construction site. Xiuhao suspects that the victim is Haila's father.. Ep 16 海拉看到雪伦故意接近秀浩时，不禁心生醋意，于是向对雪伦坦言她喜欢秀浩。秀浩决心要重新调查火灾意外，希望真相可以水落石出。Ep 17朴哲民告知海拉是她的父亲杀死秀浩的父亲，海拉感到疑惑。工人在工地里挖到一具骨骸, 秀浩怀疑死着者是海拉的父亲.

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 第二季 Puzzle Masters S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Hosted by Jiang Changjian, "Puzzle Masters Season 2" is a reality-cum-variety programme that showcases individuals with extraordinary brainpower. Wang Feng, Wei Kunlin and Bao Yun serve as team leaders. Qi Wei, Han Xue and Amber Kuo are the guests of the programme. 《最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑第二季》邀具备非凡脑力的天才上节目进行各项挑战，并以科学的方式分析各高手的能力。节目由蒋昌建主持，王峰、魏坤琳、鲍橒担任队长，戚薇、韩雪、郭采洁三位女嘉宾倾情加盟。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 22
programme.desc: A career woman in her mid-thirties living the life of the extreme needs one thing: achieving the social position of a married woman. In order to realize this goal, she seeks a man that she can bring in and make her own husband. Starring Uee and Kim Kang Woo. Ep 27作斗向艾瑞克表示要回乡下和胜珠拍摄属于他真实生活的纪录片。恩照知道吴赫心里只有胜珠，决定将保留多年吴赫制作的第一把琴送给胜珠。作斗将小振交给三位奶奶带回乡下照顾。Ep 28仁表一直找不到胜珠，于是逼灿希再替他查胜珠的下落。作斗在胜珠的掌镜下，说出了爷爷的事情，并完成了纪录片的拍摄。拍完纪录片后，作斗回到首尔去找艾瑞克。他们一同想出解决破坏胜珠当制作人的流言蜚语的计划。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight - EP 11
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 第二季 Puzzle Masters S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Hosted by Jiang Changjian, "Puzzle Masters Season 2" is a reality-cum-variety programme that showcases individuals with extraordinary brainpower. programme.title: 儿子的战争 Remember - EP 6
programme.desc: Donghao resigns as Zaihe's defense counsel out of the blue during the final trial. This resulted in Zaihe to be convicted as the murderer and sentenced to death. Zhenyu is deeply disappointed with Donghao and feels his father has suffered a grave injustice. He decides to become a lawyer and vows to vindicate his father before his execution. 由于东浩在最后的审判时突然放弃替载赫辩护申冤，让可怜的载赫被冤枉成杀人凶手被判死刑，振宇对东浩感到失望和替父亲感到委屈，决定去当律师，发誓在父亲被执行死刑之前一定会把他救出来。.

programme.title: 异口同声 Who Is The Real Singer - EP 2
programme.desc: Hosted by Chen Huan, Pop stars and impersonators face off to be the last one standing as the panel of singing judges try to determine the real singer by listening to their voices only. 由陈欢主持《异口同声》是一个大型猜评推理音乐节目，由陈欢主持。节目邀请乐坛代表性歌手讲述金曲背后故事，同时邀请模唱歌手用他们以假乱真的声线向专业猜评团发起挑战。专业猜评团由张宇、黄国伦、刘维、魏巡、马松、冯提莫组成。.

programme.title: 搜密新加坡 Secret Singapore - EP 14
programme.desc: Singapore, you can't escape Peifen's prying eye. This week, Peifen discovers hidden corners, people and activities, on our sunny island-state. Meet the mysterious rope-pullers who only gather at night, and join Peifen as she searches for a legendary magician at Jalan Besar, as well as a rumoured invisibility cloak in our midst. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 7
programme.desc: In the martial arts world of renowned novelist Jin Yong, not only are martial arts heroes awe-inspiring, but flavourful dishes also come to life. Host Michelle Chia visits Hong Kong to experience the taste of the unique cuisine favoured by our legendary heroes and their famous author. 在金庸笔下的武侠世界里，除了有武功高强的英雄人物、还有让人食指大动的美食。书中菜肴的描述，在字里行间让人垂涎，也激发厨师的创意。 这一集，主持人谢韵仪走访香港，品尝提供视觉与味觉双重享受的江湖美食。.

programme.title: 寻找原之味 Food Old Days - EP 9
programme.desc: Singapore is heralded as the Food Paradise and Singaporeans' favourite pastime includes searching out for the best hawker and local cuisines in every corner on the island. However, many traditional food fares are now on the brink of vanishing. Many of these stall owners are either old or retiring and found no one to succeed their businesses even though they may be thriving. (重)新加坡号称美食天堂，新加坡人最喜爱的休闲活动之一就是全岛搜寻最好吃的熟食档、到全岛各角落品尝本地美食。然而，随着时代进步、空间变迁，许多传统美食因为后继无人而渐渐消失，许多传统做法因为科技而渐渐失传。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 1
programme.desc: Death is inevitable, but dying painfully can and should be avoided. In Mongolia, where cancer mortality rates are one of the world's highest, Danny Yeo meets palliative care doctors whom are fighting against system and social barriers, to help patients find meaning and comfort in "a good death". 蒙古医疗资源紧张，可是临终护理一枝独秀。这跟蒙古有众多肝癌末期病人有关，更是“临终护理之母”敖登托雅教授努力的成果。杨君伟发现，临终部门的强力止痛针，对垂死病人尤其珍贵。临终护理，如何实现蒙古人的善终？.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 33
programme.desc: Ep 33: Yiyuan pays a surprise visit to the Zheng household and is shocked to find out that Haixiu is staying with the Zhengs. Yiyuan blames Yuzhen for not telling her about the living arrangements while Yuzhen lashes out at Yiyuan for not trusting him. Ep 33: 艺苑突然到宇真家拜访，发现海秀竟然住在同一个屋檐下。艺苑怪宇真没有跟她坦白，宇真则指艺苑不信任他，两人为此大吵。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 34
programme.desc: Ep 34: Yiyuan offers to move Shimei and the children to a well-renovated and spacious apartment. Shimei is tempted, but Haixiu does not want to accept Yiyuan's offer as their pride would be compromised in future. Shimei leaves home after a quarrel with Haixiu. Ep 34: 艺苑说要让世美等人搬到设备齐全的公寓去，世美心动。海秀不同意搬家，说若接受艺苑的帮助，往后就必须对她低头哈腰。世美跟海秀争吵后离家。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 16
programme.desc: Ep 18 Haila flares up when she discovered Sharon had taken her ring without her permission. Feeling guilty toward Xiuhao's father death, Haila secretly moves out of Xiuhao s place.Ep 19 Xiuhao assures Haila that his father's death does not deter him from loving her. Bai Xi meets Zhifu's descendant at the art gallery. Ep 18海拉不满雪伦没经过允许便把戒指拿走。海拉因为自己的爸爸跟秀浩的父亲之死有关连，所以暂时搬出去，想避开秀浩。Ep 19秀浩向海拉保证父亲的一死并不会影响他们的感情。白熙在画廊遇见痣福的后代。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 3 Sound Of My Dream S3 - EP 10
programme.desc: A music variety where a number of talented singers, amateur or otherwise are given the chance to "challenge" a celebrity tutor by singing one of the celebrity's songs. In exchange, the celebrity is assigned one of four randomly selected songs and has three hours to come up with a cover performance of this song. 与上季相同，基本模式为星素挑战，由追梦歌手对导师发起讨教（挑战）。但在第三季开始，选歌模式已经更换为第一季的模式，可是选择权是由参赛者说“开始”的时候，只要喊“停”，那一首歌曲就是讨教老师要唱的歌。和第一季不一样的是，每一首歌都有关键词。如果进行第二轮讨教，是没有任何的关键词。时间也从之前的6个小时改成3个小时。据华少声称，如果“惊”曲榜里的歌曲原唱者是导师的话，讨教歌手若是选择原唱者导师，将会带来的难度和风险更大，最终导致讨教失败。这一季的歌手包括林俊杰，王嘉尔，胡彦斌，张靓颖，谭维维 等。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 23
programme.desc: Ep 29Canxi steals Shengzhu's finished documentary tape according to Renbiao's instruction. However, he overhears the conversation between Shengzhu and Jingshu and realizes that Shengzhu trusts him a lot. He feels ashamed.and apologizes to Shengzhu and hands back the tape. Shengzhu and Zuodou agree to go for a movie but Shengzhu gets a last minute summon by the director of the TV station. She has no choice but to give the appointment a miss.Ep 30Zuodou visits Eric to watch him make the gaya Ep 29灿希本来按照仁表的指示偷了胜珠的纪录片完成带，但听见胜珠与景淑的对话，知道胜珠如此信任自己，感到惭愧。灿希向胜珠道歉并交出带子。胜珠和作斗本来约好要去看电影，却临时被电视台本部长召见，只好爽约。Ep 30作斗因韩胜珠爽约，便去看艾瑞克做伽耶琴。他从艾瑞克那儿得知胜珠获得电视台认可，终于可以进入电视台工作了。艾瑞克要作斗别带胜珠到乡下去生活，让她留在首尔工作......
